## IConversationStore.getMember() method

Get member information

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getMember(conversationId: ConversationId, userId: UserId): Promise<IMember>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  conversationId | <code>ConversationId</code> | The conversation to get a member from |
|  userId | <code>UserId</code> | The user to get member information about |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<IMember>`

Member info for the given user in the given conversation

## Exceptions

ConversationNotFound [ConversationNotFound](./core-conversations.conversationnotfound.md)

MemberNotFound [MemberNotFound](./core-conversations.membernotfound.md)
